steps.title: 1. Mandatory Requirements
steps.text:
Before starting:
• Active Tax ID.
• Phone Number: Must not have a WhatsApp account. Delete it in Settings > Account if necessary.
• Credit Card: For Meta's billing platform.

steps.title: 2. Meta Business Manager
steps.text:
1. Visit business.facebook.com.
2. Click 'Create account' or log in.
3. Use official business details and email.

steps.title: 3. Developer App
steps.text:
1. Access developers.facebook.com.
2. Click 'Create App'.
3. Choose 'Business' type.
4. Enter your company name as the display name.

steps.title: 4. WhatsApp Configuration
steps.text:
1. In the app dashboard, click 'Set Up' on the WhatsApp product.
2. Link it to your Business Account from step 2.
3. Go to 'API Setup' in the sidebar.

steps.title: 5. Verify Phone Number
steps.text:
1. In 'API Setup', click 'Add phone number'.
2. Choose SMS verification.
3. Enter the 6-digit code sent to your phone.

steps.title: 6. Permanent Access Token
steps.text:
CRITICAL: Temporary tokens expire in 24h. For a permanent connection:
1. Go to Business Settings > System Users.
2. Add a user named 'Integrator' as Admin.
3. Click Generate New Token, select your App, and check whatsapp_business_messaging.
4. Send this token to me.
